description.Room 1:
Initially blank, words start to appear as you flip to the first page.
The word 'LIMBO' appears in large, purple letters at the top of the page.

'Welcome to Limbo, where the souls of those not clensed of sin during their life are not granted entrance to the glorious afterlife.

It is here they will spend the rest of their days - but not you.

Continue deeper - if you dare.'

book.description_success:
You grab the leather-bound book and stache it in your pack.
The fog partially clears indicating a path forward to the north.

knife.description_success: You pick up the serrated knife, storing it safely in your belt.

meat.description_success: You stuff as much of the meat into your pack as it will carry.

cheese.description_success: You stack the cheeses and place it carefully in your pack.

grapes.description_success: You empty the bowl of grapes into your pack.

book.description_success: You should probably hold onto this.

cheese.description_success: You place the cheeses delicately onto the floor.

grapes.description_success: You pile the grapes up in the corner of the room.

chocolate.description_success: You remove the slightly melted chocolate and place it on the floor.

knife.description_success: You remove the knife from your belt and hold it firmly in your dominant hand.

book.description_success: You nibble the corner, but realize the book is probably more useful un-eaten.

knife.description_success: That just seems like a bad idea.

meat.description_success:
You feast on the meat's flesh, ripping at it with your teeth. It's delicious. Somehow you find room in your stomach to eat it all.
When you look down, you notice a loaf of bread has appeared where the meat had originally stood.

bread.description_success:
You grab fistfulls of the bread and stuff it in your mouth, barely waiting to swallow before cramming in more. It's incredibly filling, but you manage to eat the whole loaf.
You swear it was not there before, but suddently a large selection of cheeses has taken the place where the bread had been.

cheese.description_success:
You proceed to take a bite out of each of the cheeses, each one richer and more decadent than the last. Bite after bite until you realize nothing is left but the crumbs.
Once again, like magic, a bowl of grapes appears where the cheese had once been.

grapes.description_success:
You start popping grapes into your mouth and they burst with flavour. The juices are complex, vibrant, and you can't stop yourself from eating every last one.
Right on cue, the bowl that had contained the grapes had transformed into a large pile of decadent chocolates.

chocolate.description_success:
You take the tiniest bite of the corner of a piece of chocolate. It's heavenly. The sugar rush fills you with a wave of giddiness. You don't want this feeling to stop. You take another bite, and another, until you look down and see only sticky fingers remaining.
No more food emerges in the chocolate's place.
You feel ill and ready to burst, but it seems like the path forward is clear.
